debug.attach.label: EmmyLua: Attach by process id
debug.attach.name: Attach by process id
debug.attach.captureLog: Capture process log with Windows Terminal
debug.launch.label: EmmyLua: Attach by launch program
debug.launch.name: Attach by launch program
debug.launch.desc: Launch program and debug with attach debugger
debug.launch.program: Launch program and debug executable file
config.colors.parameter.description: If not empty, highlights function parameters with the given color
config.colors.global.description: If not empty, highlights global variables with the given color
config.colors.local.description: If not empty, highlights local variables with the given color
config.colors.mutableUnderline.descripti: Add underline to variables if they're reassigned within their scope
config.misc.autoInsertTripleDash.descrip: Automatically insert `"---"` when line breaking after a comment
config.ls.startParameters.description: Additional arguments to be passed to the EmmyLua language server
config.misc.executablePath.description:
Override path to the EmmyLua language server executable.

Uses bundled language server if not specified
config.misc.globalConfigPath.description:
Path to the global `.emmyrc.json`.

Settings from this file will be used if they're not overridden by the project's `.emmyrc.json`
config.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the EmmyLua language server in the Output view. Default is `off`
